title: Bloomberg Markets: Chen Sees Role Reversal for Endowments
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chen Sees Role Reversal for Endowments
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Margaret Chen Head of CA Capital Management Cambridge Associates Discussing seeing double digit gains for endowments for 2017, thanks to public equities. Janet Lorin, Bloomberg News Higher Education Reporter, also participates in the conversation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
